events.message: I am submitting a claim for my vehicle after it was involved in a collision last night at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the process and answer any questions.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have started processing it promptly.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and a copy of your driverâ€™s license for further evaluation.
All requested documents including police report and vehicle photos have been uploaded and submitted by the claimant.
Our claims team has begun investigating the circumstances surrounding the car accident to determine liability.
The accident investigation has been completed, confirming that the claimant was not at fault.
A settlement amount covering the full repair cost of the vehicle has been proposed to the claimant for approval.
The customer expressed gratitude for the quick handling and fair settlement proposal after their claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the agreed settlement will now proceed to payment.
The settlement payment has been issued directly to your bank account to cover the repair expenses.
Your auto accident claim case is now officially closed, thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
All case files and documents related to the claim have been archived for future reference if needed.
